patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project version="4">
+  <component name="SQLAndroidSettings">
+    <option name="storageVersion" value="2" />
+  </component>
+</project>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<FrameLayout
+        xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+        xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        tools:context=".CalcActivity">
+    <ImageView
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            tools:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_launcher_background"
+            android:id="@+id/imageView" android:scaleType="fitXY" android:alpha="1"
+            android:src="@drawable/ic_launcher_background"/>
+    <LinearLayout
+            android:orientation="horizontal"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent">
+        <TextView
+                android:id="@+id/tvResult"
+                android:layout_width="300dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:text="@string/editResultCalc"
+                android:textColor="#000000"
+                android:textStyle="bold"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/tvResult"
+                android:gravity="bottom|end"
+                android:background="@drawable/edit_text_style"
+                android:paddingRight="20dp"/>
+
+        <include android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                 android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                 layout="@layout/keyboard"
+                 android:alpha="0"/>
+
+    </LinearLayout>
+</FrameLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -1,15 +1,16 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <FrameLayout
         xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
-        xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+        xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
         android:layout_height="match_parent"
         tools:context=".CalcActivity">
     <ImageView
             android:layout_width="match_parent"
             android:layout_height="match_parent"
-            tools:srcCompat="@tools:sample/backgrounds/scenic"
-            android:id="@+id/imageView" android:scaleType="fitXY" android:alpha="1"/>
+            tools:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_launcher_background"
+            android:id="@+id/imageView" android:scaleType="fitXY" android:alpha="1"
+            android:src="@drawable/ic_launcher_background"/>
     <LinearLayout
             android:orientation="vertical"
             android:layout_width="match_parent"
@@ -24,7 +25,9 @@
                 android:textSize="@dimen/tvResult"
                 android:gravity="bottom|end"
                 android:background="@drawable/edit_text_style"
-                android:paddingRight="20dp"/>
+                android:paddingRight="20dp"
+                android:scrollbars="horizontal|vertical"
+        />
 
         <include android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" layout="@layout/keyboard"
                  android:alpha="0"/>
